Bagadya (; , BaÄŸaca) is a rural locality (a selo), the administrative centre of and one of two settlements, in addition to Arylakh, in Luchcheginsky 1-y Rural Okrug of Kobyaysky District in the Sakha Republic, Russia. It is located  from Sangar, the administrative center of the district. Its population as of the 2002 Census was 165.
